instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates specialized synthesis opcodes
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

giSine ftgen 1, 0, 16384, 10, 1
giSaw ftgen 2, 0, 16384, 10, 1, 0.5, 0.3, 0.25, 0.2

instr 1
    ; hsboscil opcode: ares hsboscil kamp, ktone, kbrite, ibasfreq, iwfn, ioctfn [, ioctcnt] [, iphs]
    ; hsboscil generates harmonically rich tones
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; ktone - tone (frequency multiplier)
    ; kbrite - brightness (harmonic content)
    ; ibasfreq - base frequency
    
    kAmp = 0.4
    kTone = p4
    kBrite = p5
    iBaseFreq = 110
    
    aOsc hsboscil kAmp, kTone, kBrite, iBaseFreq, giSine, giSine
    
    outs aOsc, aOsc
endin

instr 2
    ; dust opcode: ares dust kamp, kdensity
    ; dust generates random impulses
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kdensity - average number of impulses per second
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    kDensity = p4
    
    aDust dust kAmp, kDensity
    
    ; Filter for tone
    aFilt butterbp aDust, 1000, 500
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 3
    ; dust2 opcode: ares dust2 kamp, kdensity
    ; dust2 generates bipolar random impulses
    ; Similar to dust but with positive and negative values
    
    kAmp = 0.5
    kDensity = p4
    
    aDust2 dust2 kAmp, kDensity
    
    ; Resonant filter
    aFilt butterbp aDust2, 800, 300
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 4
    ; gausstrig opcode: ares gausstrig kamp, kcps, kdev [, imode] [, ifrst1]
    ; gausstrig generates gaussian-distributed random triggers
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kcps - frequency
    ; kdev - standard deviation
    
    kAmp = 0.4
    kFreq = p4
    kDev = 0.2
    
    aGauss gausstrig kAmp, kFreq, kDev
    
    ; Use as excitation for filter
    aFilt butterbp aGauss, 1500, 400
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 5
    ; mpulse opcode: ares mpulse kamp, kintvl [, ioffset]
    ; mpulse generates series of impulses
    ; kamp - amplitude
    ; kintvl - interval between impulses (seconds)
    
    kAmp = 0.6
    kInterval = p4
    
    aImpulse mpulse kAmp, kInterval
    
    ; Resonant filtering
    aFilt mode aImpulse, 440, 300
    
    outs aFilt, aFilt
endin

instr 6
    ; gendy opcode: ares gendy kamp, kampdist, kdurdist, kadpar, kddpar, kminfreq, kmaxfreq, kampscl, kdurscl [, init] [, knum]
    ; gendy implements Xenakis' dynamic stochastic synthesis
    
    kAmp = 0.4
    kAmpDist = 1  ; Linear distribution
    kDurDist = 1
    kAdPar = 0.5
    kDdPar = 0.5
    kMinFreq = p4
    kMaxFreq = p5
    kAmpScl = 0.5
    kDurScl = 0.5
    
    aGendy gendy kAmp, kAmpDist, kDurDist, kAdPar, kDdPar, kMinFreq, kMaxFreq, kAmpScl, kDurScl
    
    outs aGendy, aGendy
endin

instr 7
    ; gendyc opcode: ares gendyc kamp, kampdist, kdurdist, kadpar, kddpar, kminfreq, kmaxfreq, kampscl, kdurscl, knum [, init]
    ; gendyc is controlled version with explicit number of control points
    
    kAmp = 0.4
    kAmpDist = 2  ; Cauchy distribution
    kDurDist = 1
    kAdPar = 0.3
    kDdPar = 0.7
    kMinFreq = 200
    kMaxFreq = 800
    kAmpScl = 0.4
    kDurScl = 0.6
    kNum = 12
    
    aGendyc gendyc kAmp, kAmpDist, kDurDist, kAdPar, kDdPar, kMinFreq, kMaxFreq, kAmpScl, kDurScl, kNum
    
    outs aGendyc, aGendyc
endin

instr 8
    ; gendyx opcode: ares gendyx kamp, kampdist, kdurdist, kadpar, kddpar, kminfreq, kmaxfreq, kampscl, kdurscl, knum, iwform [, init] [, iskip]
    ; gendyx extends gendy with custom waveform
    
    kAmp = 0.4
    kAmpDist = 1
    kDurDist = 1
    kAdPar = 0.5
    kDdPar = 0.5
    kMinFreq = 300
    kMaxFreq = 600
    kAmpScl = 0.5
    kDurScl = 0.5
    kNum = 10
    iWform = 1
    
    aGendyx gendyx kAmp, kAmpDist, kDurDist, kAdPar, kDdPar, kMinFreq, kMaxFreq, kAmpScl, kDurScl, kNum, iWform
    
    outs aGendyx, aGendyx
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

; Play hsboscil
; Format: start dur tone brightness
i1 0 2 2 0.5
i1 2.5 2 3 0.8

; Play dust
; Format: start dur density
i2 5.5 2 20
i2 7.5 2 50

; Play dust2
i3 10.5 2 30

; Play gausstrig
i4 13.5 2 15

; Play mpulse
; Format: start dur interval
i5 16.5 2 0.1
i5 18.5 2 0.05

; Play gendy
; Format: start dur minfreq maxfreq
i6 21.5 4 220 880

; Play gendyc
i7 26.5 4

; Play gendyx
i8 31.5 4

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>

instruction: Write a CSound instrument that demonstrates advanced specialized synthesis techniques
output:
<CsoundSynthesizer>
<CsOptions>
-odac
</CsOptions>
<CsInstruments>

sr = 44100
kr = 4410
ksmps = 10
nchnls = 2
0dbfs = 1

giSine ftgen 1, 0, 16384, 10, 1

instr 1
    ; Granular texture with dust
    kDensity linseg 10, p3, 80
    aDust dust 0.6, kDensity
    
    ; Multiple resonances
    aRes1 butterbp aDust, 440, 200
    aRes2 butterbp aDust, 660, 150
    aRes3 butterbp aDust, 880, 180
    
    aMix = (aRes1 + aRes2 + aRes3) * 0.4
    
    outs aMix, aMix
endin

instr 2
    ; Rhythmic impulses with mpulse
    kInterval linseg 0.2, p3, 0.05
    aImpulse mpulse 0.7, kInterval
    
    ; Pitched resonance
    kFreq expseg 220, p3, 880
    aRes mode aImpulse, kFreq, 400
    
    outs aRes*0.6, aRes*0.6
endin

instr 3
    ; Dynamic gendy synthesis
    kAmp = 0.4
    
    ; Evolving parameters
    kAdPar linseg 0.1, p3, 0.9
    kDdPar linseg 0.9, p3, 0.1
    kMinFreq expseg 200, p3, 400
    kMaxFreq expseg 800, p3, 1200
    
    aGendy gendy kAmp, 1, 1, kAdPar, kDdPar, kMinFreq, kMaxFreq, 0.5, 0.5
    
    outs aGendy, aGendy
endin

instr 4
    ; Layered hsboscil timbres
    kAmp = 0.3
    
    ; Evolving brightness
    kBrite linseg 0.2, p3, 0.9
    
    aOsc1 hsboscil kAmp, 1, kBrite, 110, giSine, giSine
    aOsc2 hsboscil kAmp, 1.5, kBrite*0.7, 110, giSine, giSine
    aOsc3 hsboscil kAmp, 2, kBrite*0.5, 110, giSine, giSine
    
    aMix = (aOsc1 + aOsc2 + aOsc3) * 0.4
    
    outs aMix, aMix
endin

instr 5
    ; Stochastic percussion with gausstrig
    kFreq = p4
    kDev = 0.3
    
    aGauss gausstrig 0.7, kFreq, kDev
    
    ; Multiple filtered copies
    aHi butterbp aGauss, 3000, 800
    aMid butterbp aGauss, 1200, 400
    aLo butterbp aGauss, 400, 200
    
    aMix = (aHi*0.3 + aMid*0.5 + aLo*0.7) * 0.5
    
    outs aMix, aMix
endin

</CsInstruments>
<CsScore>

; Play granular dust texture
i1 0 5

; Play rhythmic impulses
i2 6 4

; Play dynamic gendy
i3 11 5

; Play layered hsboscil
i4 17 4

; Play stochastic percussion
i5 22 2 10
i5 24 2 20
i5 26 2 30

e
</CsScore>
</CsoundSynthesizer>
